skill.name: image-enhancer
skill.description: Improves the quality of images, especially screenshots, by enhancing resolution, sharpness, and clarity. Perfect for preparing images for presentations, documentation, or social media posts.
skill.summary: Improves the quality of images, especially screenshots, by enhancing resolution, sharpness, and clarity.
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: All static findings are false positives. The skill is a legitimate image enhancement tool that uses markdown documentation with example prompts. Pattern-matching detected markdown code blocks as code execution and misinterpreted JSON field names as C2 indicators.

content.value_statement: Low-quality images and screenshots can ruin presentations and documentation. This skill improves image resolution, sharpness, and clarity with a single prompt.
actual_capabilities: Upscales images to higher resolutions including 2K and 4K
Improves sharpness and clarity of blurry or compressed images
Reduces compression artifacts and noise in images
Supports batch processing of multiple images
Optimizes images for different use cases like web, print, or social media
limitations: Cannot recover detail that was not present in the original image
Results may vary based on the quality of the source image
Processing time increases with image size and batch quantity
Does not edit image content or remove unwanted objects

use_cases.title: Documentation and Blog Posts
use_cases.description: Enhance screenshots from software tools to create clear, professional documentation or blog post images.

use_cases.title: Social Media Images
use_cases.description: Optimize and enhance images for social media platforms with appropriate sizing and quality improvements.

use_cases.title: Presentations and Reports
use_cases.description: Upscale low-resolution images for use in presentations and reports that will be displayed on large screens.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Image Enhancement
prompt_templates.scenario: When you need a simple quality improvement for a single image

prompt_templates.title: Resolution Upscaling
prompt_templates.scenario: When you need to increase the resolution for larger displays

prompt_templates.title: Sharpen Blurry Image
prompt_templates.scenario: When an image lacks clarity and needs edge enhancement

prompt_templates.title: Batch Processing
prompt_templates.scenario: When you need to process multiple images at once

best_practices: Keep original files as backup before enhancement
Specify the intended use case (web, print, social media) for optimal results
Use PNG format for maximum quality or JPG for smaller file sizes
anti_patterns: Do not expect miracles from heavily compressed or low-detail images
Do not use for images that will be further compressed heavily
Do not rely on enhancement to fix images with missing content

faq.question: Can this skill fix completely blurry images?
faq.answer: Enhancement can improve slightly blurry images, but it cannot recover detail that was not captured in the original image.

faq.question: What image formats are supported?
faq.answer: The skill supports common formats including PNG and JPG for both input and output.

faq.question: Does the skill modify the original file?
faq.answer: No, the skill preserves the original file and saves the enhanced version with a modified filename.

faq.question: How long does enhancement take?
faq.answer: Processing time depends on image size. Single screenshots typically take a few seconds, while large or batch files may take longer.

faq.question: What resolution should I target?
faq.answer: For web use, 2x resolution works well. For print or large displays, target 4K or higher based on your output requirements.

faq.question: Can I enhance multiple images at once?
faq.answer: Yes, you can specify a directory to batch process all compatible images in that folder.
